    • About Allen Johnson


    AJ Team of Keller Williams Realty is made up of a group of experienced, hardworking and knowledgeable Real Estate professionals committed to selling some of the most desired homes in Northern Virginia, Maryland & DC. As our motto indicates, selling these “right addresses” is our mission – You Have The Dream, We Have The Address.
